name: Wall Scrawl
description:
Type the letters that appear on the wall. If you misspell, you can press spacebar to clear the word.

This game was created for the 44th Weekly Game Jam. The theme is "graffiti".

Code & graphics: Sami Ylikulju (CKana)

Music & sound effects: Scowsh (https://soundcloud.com/scowsh)
